remarks: The powers of a group element give a homomorphism from ` ZZ ` to a group.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jun-2015.)  Obsolete version of ~ mulgghm2 as of 12-Jun-2019.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
mulgghm2OLD.1 $e |- Z = ( CCfld |`s ZZ ) $.
mulgghm2OLD.2 $e |- .x. = ( .g ` R ) $.
mulgghm2OLD.3 $e |- F = ( n e. ZZ |-> ( n .x. .1. ) ) $.
mulgghm2OLD.4 $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
mulgghm2OLD $p |- ( ( R e. Grp /\ .1. e. B ) -> F e. ( Z GrpHom R ) ) $.
$d .1. n $.
$d .x. n $.
$d B n $.
$d R n $.
$d Z n $.
